ಹುಟ್ಟಲಿಲ್ಲವೆನಿಸು huṭṭalillavenisu to kill; ಹುಟ್ಟಿದ ದಿನ huṭṭida dina the day of a person's birth or a thing's beginning; birth-day; 2. the anniversary of this day; 3. (fig.) a difficult condition; ಹುಟ್ಟಿದ ಹಬ್ಬ huṭṭida habba = ಹುಟ್ಟಿದ ದಿನ - 1 & 2; 3. harsh, severe treatment; stern action; ಹುಟ್ಟು ಹಬ್ಬ huṭṭu habba = ಹುಟ್ಟಿದ ಹಬ್ಬ.
the act or fact of coming into life or of being born; birth.
the state or period of living (of a human being); life.
the native place, country of a person.
the look or outward aspect of a person or thing; appearance.
something produced or got as a result of an industrial or other activity.
a wooden spoon.
a long pole with a broad blade at one end used to row a boat; an oar.
a poet who has got the poetic talent by birth.
= ಪುಟ್ಟುಗುರುಡ.
= ಪುಟ್ಟುಗುರುಡಿ.
a place from where something originates, is supplied, etc.; the original source.
a man who is blind by birth.
a woman who is blind by birth.
the act or fact of coming into life or of being born; an instance of this; birth.
the eastern mountain, behind which the sun apparently rises from.
= ಪುಟ್ಟುಗೆ.
= ಪುಟ್ಟಿಹಣ್ಣು.
rolling oneself from one side to another (as from pain).
the planet that we live on; terrestrial globe; the earth.
a king; a ruler.
a man actively engaged in politics, esp. party politics, professionally or otherwise holding or seeking political office; a politician.
(derog.) a petty politician.
finely ground meal of grain as wheat, rice, etc.; flour.
coarsely ground grain.
loose, gritty particles of worn or disintegrtated rock; sandy soil.
a preparation of powdered tobacco that is inhaled by sniffing; snuff.
processed leaf (of leaves) of tobacco plant.
= ಪುಡಿಗಾಸು.
a small chest or box, as for jewels; a casket.
a small package; a packet.
several objects or a quantity of material gathered or bound together; a bundle.
a cup made of a leaf (esp. of banana or lotus plant).
a metal, wooden container, with a hinged lid; a box.
a basket.
a small earthenware.
a place of dwelling, protection, etc.; a shelter.
miscellaneous, but usu. petty expenses.
small amount of money (often, collectively, coins of small denominations one has).
a customer who buys goods (from a seller) in small quantities.
to cause to shatter into pieces.
to cause to demolish or destroy completely.
to break or shatter into pieces.
to demolish or destroy completely.
= ಪುಡಿಗುಟ್ಟು.

thin and short hair (on the scalp).
a kind of dry powder made of fried pulses, copra, chillies and other spices, used to mix with rice or taken with cakes, chapattis, etc.

a playing in the dust.
to play in the dust.
to wear away by losing particles on the surface.
to become demolished, destroyed completely.
to be powdered, pulverised.
